Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Beefy \Beef"y\, a. Having much beef; of the nature of beef; resembling beef; fleshy. [1913 Webster]

beefy adj : muscular and heavily built; "a beefy wrestler"; "had a tall burly frame"; "clothing sizes for husky boys"; "a strapping boy of eighteen"; "`buirdly' is a Scottish term" [syn: {burly}, {husky}, {strapping}, {buirdly}] [also: {beefiest}, {beefier}]
